scripts.build: npm run compile-proto && tsc && npm run compile-proto-dist
scripts.compile-proto-dist: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs ../../schema/events/**/*.proto -o ./dist/proto/index.js && pbts -o ./dist/proto/index.d.ts ./dist/proto/index.js && terser ./dist/proto/index.js -c passes=2 -o ./dist/proto/index.js
scripts.compile-proto: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs ../../schema/events/**/*.proto -o ./src/proto/index.js && pbts -o ./src/proto/index.d.ts ./src/proto/index.js && terser ./src/proto/index.js -c passes=2 -o ./src/proto/index.js
